author: Kristy Johnson
title: Justin Bieber's ex Sahara Ray flaunts leggy figure | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 86 shares Allowing her blonde locks to fall predominately over one side of her face in tousled waves, Sahara sported a neutral makeup palette, coating her very plump pout with nude lipstick. Accompanying the snap with quite the statement, the model wrote: 'F**k with myself,' alongside a plane emoji. Daring to bare: Earlier this month, Sahara posed for another series of racy snaps in the same ensemble, this time showing off a hint of underboob in the skimpy top Earlier this month, Sahara posed for another series of racy snaps in the same ensemble. Posing against a white wall, the blonde beauty showed off a hint of underboob in the skimpy top. Sahara drew attention to her slender waist in the high-cut briefs, while also flaunting her toned legs. 'Been thinking bout you (sic),' the socialite captioned the sultry snap, which was taken while holidaying in Tulum, Mexico. Blonde beauty: The socialite showed off her ample assets in the frilly boob tube as she holidayed in Tulum, Mexico With her fair tresses blowing in the wind, the swimwear designer struck a pose while showing off her glowing complexion. Her cheekbones were made to look even more prominent with highlighter, while a touch of bronzer swept across the contours of her face. The racy snap comes just after Sahara shared a photo of herself posing on the beach with model Maya Stepper and porn star Jessie Andrews. Bombshells on the beach: The swimwear designer was snapped posing up a storm with model Maya Stepper and porn star Jessie Andrews on the beach 'Infinite sand cuddles & laugh attacks with these 2. Come back to me alreadyyyy @jessieandrews @mayastepper,' she captioned her photo. Opting for a pair of black high-waisted briefs and a white crop top, the social media star had her assets on display as she modelled designs from her own label. Sahara, who is the daughter of famous surfer Tony Ray, made headlines last year when she was spotted taking a skinny dip in Hawaii with Justin Bieber. Famous ex? The Australian stunner made headlines last year after her skinny dip in Hawaii with Justin Bieber was documented on social media The now infamous outing was documented on social media, with the blonde beauty sharing photos of herself and the 22-year-old singer. It is unclear if they were dating during the 'holiday romance' and Sahara has not yet spoken publicly about the incident. She was previously linked to Gold Coast singer Cody Simpson after they were seen kissing outside an LA nightclub in October 2015. Entourage: Sahara has stayed tight-lipped on whether she was dating Justin, but were photographed together on several occasions during the trip Hot property: Sahara, who is the daughter of famous surfer Tony Ray, has amassed an impressive 1.2 million followers on Instagram Share or comment on this article 86
